feed.title: Projects - Azer Koculu
feed.subtitle: Open Source Projects I've been working on

entry.title: testrunner.xsl
entry.summary: A unit testing tool made up of just an XSL document, for javascript projects.

entry.title: MultiplayerChess.Org
entry.summary: A web based chess application provides playing chess with other players using a mobile phone or PC. It's under development in these days.

entry.title: pyChessEngine
entry.summary: An event-driven chess engine.Coded in Python

entry.title: GarantiFox
entry.summary: An Mozilla Firefox extension providing tracking bank accounts to users of GarantiBank

entry.title: FFUZBL
entry.summary: A Mozilla Firefox extension emulating layout of the UZBL browser.

entry.title: Firebug Lite 1.2
entry.summary: A subset of Firebug that can be used in all browsers including Internet Explorer.
